titles.title: State and Local Corrections Officer Retirement Fairness Act of 2022
State and Local Corrections Officer Retirement Fairness Act of 2022
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the exemption from the retirement plan early withdrawal penalty for public safety officers to State and local government corrections employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
State and Local Corrections Officer Retirement Fairness Act of 2022
This bill extends the exemption from the penalty for early withdrawals from tax-exempt retirement plans currently allowed to federal public safety officers to certain state and local government corrections officers.
